message.invalid_area: This area most likely does not have places suitable for the size of your boat.
message.invalid_area_selection: Please note! You have selected areas with no available places for the size of your boat.
message.invalid_berth: This harbour most likely does not have berths suitable for the size and type of your boat.

cityOfHelsinkiPrivacyStatementLink.text: The privacy policy of the city of Helsinki

privacyPoliciesAgreement.label: I have read and agree to the following documents:

accessibility.label: Currently, there are no accessible berths in our harbours.

agreed.label: I have read the terms and conditions of the contract and agree to abide by them.

inspected.label: I confirm that the vessel has been inspected.

insurance.label: I confirm that the vessel is insured, and that the insurance covers any costs arising from hoisting the vessel.

text.inspection_and_insurance: The inspection certificate and an extract from the insurance policy must be provided prior to berth assignment. The inspection and insurance must remain valid with no interruptions. The lessor has the right to demand that the inspection certificate and the extract from the insurance policy are presented at any time.
text.summary: Vessels weighing more than 20,000 kg are moored in designated berths. Berths for larger vessels are reserved either on a fixed-term basis or until further notice.

header.title: Information on the boat to be purchased

application_code.description: If you have received a search code from customer services, please enter it here. Search codes are intended for customers who have already applied for a boat berth via a paper application form.
application_code.title: Search code

guarantee.label: I confirm that the information I have provided is correct.
I have read the marina rules concerning winter storage at {{link}} (in Finnish) and I commit to them. I assure that the information I have provided is correct.
I confirm that the information I have provided is correct.

agreement.title: I confirm that the information I have provided is correct

also.title: and information on the following culture and leisure-time services offered by the City of Helsinki

receivable_items.title: I want to receive the following via e-mail

unmarked_winter_overview.legend: Please check the accuracy of the information once more before submitting your notice.
unmarked_winter_overview.title: Summary

storage_type.label: The boat is stored on a trailer
storage_type.text: If stored on a trailer, one metre is added to the length of the boat.

header.title: Information on a registered boat
header.legend: Enter the information from the boat's registration certificate. The registration number must be provided if the boat is longer than 5.5 m or has an engine power of 15 kW or more.

services.label: Narrow down the list based on harbour services
Narrow down the list based on services available at the location

storage_method.label: Storage method
storage_method.on_trailer: I will be storing the boat on a trailer
storage_method.on_trestles: I will be storing the boat on trestles

field.label: Trailer’s register number
field.text: Only registered trailers are allowed on winter storage areas. If the trailer’s registration number is not yet known, report the registration number before bringing the boat in for winter storage. Storing on a trailer requires 1m extra storage space length.

button.invalid: Please complete the form to continue

paragraph.first: This service allows for you to browse through the boat harbours in Helsinki and submit new applications to the harbours of your choice.
paragraph.second: NOTE! Please read the instructions on selecting harbours as well as further details concerning the principles of assigning berths and the processing times for applications on the <0>hel.fi</0> website before completing your application.

berth.title: Applying for a berth in the boat harbours of the City of Helsinki

paragraph.first: Here you can apply for a winter storage space for your boat in the City of Helsinki’s storage locations. Appointed spaces become available only rarely, so please also include locations with no designated spaces in your application.
paragraph.second: NOTE! Please read the instructions on selecting storage areas as well as further details concerning the principles of assigning storage spaces and the processing times for applications on the <0>hel.fi</0> website before completing your application. <3/> If you are interested in storing your boat in the water at your designated boat berth over the winter, please contact us.

paragraph.first: Using this service, you can notify us that you have taken your boat to a unmarked winter storage area. Due to the nature of the unmarked winter storage areas, we cannot assign places in them in advance.
paragraph.second: You can find further details concerning the principles of assigning winter storage spaces, the prices and the processing of applications on the <0>hel.fi website</0>.

unmarked_winter_storage.title: Submit a notice that your boat has been taken to a winter storage area

berth.legend: Browse the harbours and berths offered by the City. Choose up to ten suitable harbours for your application.
berth.title: What type of berth are you looking for?

boat.legend: Boat berths are applied for boat-specifically. Please enter the boat information for the boat you are intending to keep in the berth here. You may also apply for a berth even if you do not have a boat as of yet.
boat.title: Boat information

overview.legend: Please check the accuracy of the information once more before submitting your application.
overview.title: Summary

person.legend: Berths can be applied for by private individuals, organisations and companies. Companies are charged an increased annual rent.
person.title: Applicant information

selected_areas.legend: Review the winter storage areas you have chosen and their suitability for your boat. Order the areas you have chosen by preference.
selected_areas.title: Your selection

selected_berths.legend: Review the harbours you have chosen and their suitability for your boat. Order the harbours you have chosen by preference.
selected_berths.title: Your selection

winter.legend: Please enter the dimensions of the boat to be stored. You can see the locations with spaces suitable for the size of your boat in the location list. You can also sort the list based on the services available at the location.
winter.title: Browse and search for winter storage locations

unmarked_winter.legend: Select the winter storage area to which you have taken your boat.
unmarked_winter.title: Select the winter storage area

unmarked_winter_boat.legend: When you have taken your boat to a unmarked winter storage area, please notify us. First, provide the information of the boat you have taken to the area.
unmarked_winter_boat.title: Boat information

unmarked_winter_owner.legend: Provide the boat owner’s information. Companies are charged an increased fee.
unmarked_winter_owner.title: The owner’s information

unmarked_winter_overview.legend: The notice is complete! Please check that the information you have provided is correct. If necessary, you can go back and edit the information.
unmarked_winter_overview.title: Check the notice

message.paragraph1: You will shortly receive a confirmation message to the e-mail address you provided on your application. If you wish to change or cancel your application or ask any questions regarding your application, please e-mail venepaikkavaraukset@hel.fi.
message.paragraph2:
Helsingin kaupungin venepaikkavaraukset (Berth reservations of the City of Helsinki)
venepaikkavaraukset.hel.fi
Advice over the telephone is available 9–12 Monday–Thursday by calling 09 310 87900.

application_sent.title: Thank you, your application has been sent successfully!

alert.paragraph_berth: Select the desired harbours from the list of harbours
alert.paragraph_winter: Select the desired winter storage areas from the list of areas

alert.strong_winter: Please note! You have not yet selected any winter storage areas

selected.info_text_winter: Select the type and size of your boat to see if the selected area have any available places

selected.title_winter: Please order the places you have chosen by preference.

auth.heading: Jatka hakemuksen tekoa
auth.paragraph_berth: Venepaikkahakemuksen jättämiseksi pyydämme sinua tunnistautumaan. Tunnistautuminen toimii pankkitunnuksilla tai mobiilivarmenteella. Tunnistautumisen lisäksi sinulla on mahdollisuus hyödyntää Helsinki-profiilia, jolla voit hallita tietojasi useissa Helsingin kaupungin palveluissa.
auth.paragraph_winter: Venepaikkahakemuksen jättämiseksi pyydämme sinua tunnistautumaan. Tunnistautuminen toimii pankkitunnuksilla tai mobiilivarmenteella. Tunnistautumisen lisäksi sinulla on mahdollisuus hyödyntää Helsinki-profiilia, jolla voit hallita tietojasi useissa Helsingin kaupungin palveluissa.
auth.contact: Jos sinulla on kysyttävää, ota yhteytta venepaikat@hel.fi

current_berth.info_text: EN: Olet tekemässä vaihtohakemusta, joten jos saat tähän hakemukseen venepaikkatarjouksen ja hyväksyt sen, se korvaa nykyisen venepaikkasi.  Tätä varten hakemukseen tarvitaan tiedot nykyisestä venepaikastasi.
current_berth.select_info_text: EN: Vaihtohakemukseen haettiin seuraavat tiedot nykyisestä venepaikasta, valitse minkä paikan haluat vaihtaa:
current_berth.title: Information on your current berth

reason.info_text: You can select a special request concerning the type of the new berth from the list. Please note, however, that if you select a special request, you will only be offered a berth when a berth meeting your request becomes available.
reason.title: Special request for a new berth

switch_application.warning: You can select up to five harbours for your switch application. Please remove excess selections and change the application type again.

cancel_order.title: Offer/invoice cancellation

message.paragraph1: Are you sure you want to cancel the offer/invoice?
message.paragraph2_berth:
NOTE! This function will cancel the following documents connected to the berth in question:
lease agreement and invoice
message.paragraph2_winter:
NOTE! This function will cancel the following documents connected to the place in question:
lease agreement and invoice
message.paragraph2_application_berth: NOTE! If you decide not to have the offered berth or if you don’t pay the berth fee, your application will be deleted. If you want to apply for a berth again, you must make a new application at https://venepaikat.hel.fi/en/
message.paragraph2_application_winter: NOTE! If you decide not to have the offered place or if you don’t pay the place fee, your application will be deleted. If you want to apply for a place again, you must make a new application at https://venepaikat.hel.fi/en/
message.paragraph3: If you do not want to cancel, you can close this page.<0/>Questions and further information: <1>venepaikkavaraukset@hel.fi</1>

cancel_order.confirmation: I want to cancel the offer/invoice

order_cancelled.message: We have received the cancellation and your place has been terminated. You will receive a confirmation to your email.

message.paragraph1: Your unmarked winter storage notice has now been sent.
message.paragraph2: Thank you for submitting the notice! This will help us serve boaters better, both now and in the future.

payment_failed.paragraph2: Please try again later, or contact the customer service.

contract.title: Signing the contract and paying the invoice
contract.info: Dear customer, we have created for you a contract that is to be signed electronically. See the contract below. You can continue to identify and pay after accepting the terms of the contract. Obtaining a berth or winter storage place requires acceptance of the terms of a contract.

berth_offer.heading: Offer for berth. If you wish to accept it, please pay the invoice before the due date {{date}}.
berth_offer.info_text: The invoice will be deleted in both cases (accept/decline). If you wish to have a different berth, accept the offer and make an switch application. Switch applications are processed yearly before new applications.

berth_invoice.heading: Berth information

Berth invoice. If you wish to continue the contract,
 please pay the invoice before the due date, {{date}}.

berth_switch_offer.info_text: Dear customer, do you accept the berth we offer? If you do not want to accept the new berth, you will retain your current berth
berth_switch_offer.decline: I do not want the new berth, I will keep my current berth

notice.paragraph1: Applying for winter storage spaces in the 2020–2021 season is now current. Customers who have had a square space in the last season will be sent an invoice for the space. If you are a new applicant, you can apply for a square space by filling out the online application at <0>venepaikat.hel.fi/en</0>. Available squares will be assigned on a first-come, first-served basis in the autumn. We will send offers for these spaces by e-mail.
notice.paragraph2: Customers who have had a winter storage space in a unmarked winter storage area will not be sent an invoice. Instead, they can pay their fee onto the berth reservation account after the boat has been brought to the unmarked winter storage area. We will provide information about paying for unmarked winter storage area spaces later online at <0>hel.fi/boating</0> and on the information boards of unmarked winter storage areas. Customers who have paid for a winter storage space will be sent a winter storage sticker to be attached to their boats on a visible spot.
notice.paragraph3: Boaters can bring their boats to the unmarked winter storage area of their choosing starting from 15 September 2020. Please note that boats must not be brought to unmarked winter storage areas before the storage season starts on 15 September.
notice.title: Applying for winter storage spaces 2020–2021

appointed_spaces.label: Appointed spaces
appointed_spaces.text: Boats have their own marked places. Appointed spaces become available rarely.

free_spaces.label: Unmarked areas
free_spaces.text: Unmarked storage locations are filled in the order that the boats are hoisted.

footer.terms_of_service: Description of the personal data file

message.must_be_email: The value must be an e-mail address
message.must_be_number: The value must be a number
message.must_be_phone_number: The value must be a telephone number
message.must_be_positive_number: The value must be greater than zero
message.must_be_ssn: Entered value is not a valid SSN
